name: Traveler's Camouflage
flavorText: You and your allies take on the textures and colors of the world around you.
text: You cloak yourself and any allies present for the ritual in a camouflaging shroud. The subjects of this ritual gain a bonus to Stealth checks while traveling, and other creatures take a penalty when using Perception to find your tracks.  Your Nature check determines the bonus you and your allies gain and the penalty others take.
